tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Have known Dr. Prashant Patel for more than a decade now. We may have shifted from the vicinity but we cannot imagine any other doctor for anything dentistry. Equipped with advance technology and consultative doctor. Puts you at ease everytime we visit him and have always come out satisfied and well taken care of..
Visited doctor for wisdom tooth extraction.  The process was quick, easy and painless. Doctor was very warm and friendly, very helpful staff

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review:
I have known  Dr. Prashant since 7 years now. He is the Bestest Dentist I have ever been to !!! Extremely soft spoken and humble, his patients are always super comfortable and at ease. I am very grateful to him for making my dental experience as painless as possible. Infact I experienced zero pain during my RC treatments and had no need to taken a local anesthesia injection...that itself speaks volumes of what a Brilliant Dentist Dr. Prashant is !!!

Thank you so very much Dr. Prashant...You are a ROCKSTAR !!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Amazing experience. I travelled  from UAE and was suggested by a friend as I was desperately looking for a dental surgeon.
It was a continued job on my implants and Dr  Prashant had all the patience in understanding  the same from my earlier doc in Pune and most importantly, giving me the confidence of finishing it .  He was so involved while at surgery, and always so concerned to keep checking if it's paining you or not.
I ve found the dentist I was looking for in Dr Prashant,  for my entire family in Borivili. 
Happy to recommend him anytime.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
The tooth extraction process was done with care and precision by Dr. Gautam, while Dr. Prashant assisted him and was comforting at every point in the process, laying out the details of what was happening. This kept me at ease throughout.
I also received a follow-up call the next day to ask how I was doing, which enhanced the experience. 
All the guidelines on how to take care of the pain post extraction were clearly laid out and well communicated. Luckily I didn't experience any swelling or pain afterwards and everything went well :)
reply_text:
I am glad we could comfort you 
Take care
